# whimsy Provider

The Whimsy provider generates memorable random names using plants, animals, and colors.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    whimsy = {
      source = "github.com/mioi/whimsy"
    }
  }
}

provider "whimsy" {}
```
